listitem.para: Outputs a number, the distance the turtle must travel along a straight line to reach a 3D coordinate. The position must be given as a three element list containing the X, Y, and Z coordinates of the position to face.
This command is designed to run in PERSPECTIVE mode.

listitem.programlisting: PERSPECTIVE SETPOSXYZ [0 0 0] SHOW DISTANCEXYZ [0 100 0] 100 SHOW DISTANCEXYZ [100 100 100] 173.205080756888
